attributes.action: re introduce "Proportional Representation" including an abstention box on the ballot paper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would ensure a fair voting system which will provide a true represention of the number of votes that a party receives, not boundery areas that they control.
An abstention box on the ballot paper will provide voters with a recorded vote and enable them to have their say when they have lost confidence in all political parties. This would send a clear message to MP's many who need to start being honest with the British people mean what they say and carry out their pre election promises instead of finding excuses for none compiance after they have been elected.
